citations.narrative:
The facility has not been completely filling out the APHIS form 7006- Record of Disposition. Box 5B of the APHIS form
7006 is not being filled out when the buyer is not licensed with the USDA. Obtaining complete information at the time of
disposition is important for disease traceability and for facilitating APHIS inspections. Each dealer shall make, keep, and
maintain records which fully and correctly disclose information concerning dogs sold or otherwise disposed of by the
facility, including the vehicle license number and State, and the driver's license and State, if the person is not licensed or
registered under the Animal Welfare Act. Correct by: December 4, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.75(a)(1)(iii) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
The facility has not been completely filling out the APHIS form 7006- Record of Disposition. Box 5B of the APHIS form 
7006 is not being filled out when the buyer is not licensed with the USDA. Obtaining complete information at the time of 
disposition is important for disease traceability and for facilitating APHIS inspections. Each dealer shall make, keep, and 
maintain records which fully and correctly disclose information concerning dogs sold or otherwise disposed of by the 
facility, including the vehicle license number and State, and the driver's license and State, if the person is not licensed or 
registered under the Animal Welfare Act. Correct by: December 4, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
